titles.title: There is no satisfation outside salvation
(S-A-L-V-A-T-I-O-N)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is no satisfaction outside
salvation,
S-A-L-V-A-T-I-O-N;
There is no satisfaction outside
salvation,
S-A-L-V-A-T-I-O-N.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Shout it out, loud and clear,
S-A-L-V-A-T-I-O-N.
Shout it out, loud and clear,
S-A-L-V-A-T-I-O-N.
